MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL20 8 postcode area of Llangollen, affecting properties in Coed Afon, Regent Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.07pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.51pm on 29th of April 2021.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL20 8 postcode area of Llangollen, affecting properties in Coed Afon, Regent Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.07pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.51pm on 29th of April 2021.

MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA8 postcode area of Widnes, affecting properties in Heathfield Park and the surrounding area. Repairs to the underground cable in Queensbury Way are taking longer than expected. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2pm on April 29, 2021.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the WA8 postcode area of Widnes, affecting properties in Heathfield Park and the surrounding area. Repairs to the underground cable in Queensbury Way are taking longer than expected. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2pm on April 29, 2021.

MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Raithhill and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs safely to an underground cable fault on Raithhill, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.55pm on Thursday 29th April 2021.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Raithhill and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs safely to an underground cable fault on Raithhill, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.55pm on Thursday 29th April 2021.
